short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the Best Place from a list of businesses your insurance company gave you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If your insurance company gave you a list of businesses to choose from, we'll help you find the Best Place.

When you're on your insurance company's website, fire up the extension and it will collect phone numbers to search for businesses on review sites. Then we'll list all the places we found and rank them based on their reviews to help you choose the one for you!
